title: Boosting ultra-fast charging in lithium metal batteries through enhanced solventâ€“anion interaction via conjugation effect
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00391H, Paper
Jialin Wang, Lin Xie, Wanbao Wu, Yihong Liang, Miaomiao Cao, Chaochao Gao, Yiyang Bo, Jichuan Zhang, Jiaheng Zhang
A novel sulfonate-based eutectic electrolyte has been designed for ultra-fast charging LMBs, benefiting from the high Li+ transference number and gradient SEI layer resulting from strong solvent-anion interactions due to the conjugation effect.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
